mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.class_code AS "classCode", a.class_name AS "className", a.pacs_class AS "pacsClass", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sicmed_cure_class a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.class_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{classCode},'%')
AND a.class_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{className},'%')
AND a.pacs_class LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pacsClass},'%')
AND a.sort LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sort},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_cure_class( id, class_code, class_name, pacs_class, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{classCode}, #{className}, #{pacsClass}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_cure_class SET class_code = #{classCode}, class_name = #{className}, pacs_class = #{pacsClass}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
